TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit MiscellaneousBitsAttribute extends System.Attribute

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("Microsoft.VisualC.dll is an obsolete assembly and exists only for backwards compatibility.")

Docs.summary: An attribute that stores miscellaneous information about a type in metadata.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This attribute is used to determine if a type is a native class and whether it was defined with the `struct` or `class` keyword.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(int32 miscellaneousBits) cil managed

Docs.param: A bit mask containing information about a type.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.MiscellaneousBitsAttribute"> class using the specified bit mask.
A bit mask containing information about a type.
